channel.title: GoodCode on Eunhan's library
channel.description: Recent content in GoodCode on Eunhan's library

item.title: How to Wright Good Code
item.description: Clarity Input and Output Most mistakes are coming from misunderstanding of range for the input and output. We need to find the range of input and output specifically. Each Steps of Algorithm must be Clear The steps of algorithm separated clearly. Thus, you or co-workers may not misunderstand the code. Need to Study computer structure Some codes got issue because of computer structure. If you calculate int type addition, the result is wrong because integer overflow.
